root.title: mcdowel i merger interpharm inc
root.body: mcdowel enterpris inc sai sign definit agreement acquir 80 pct interest privat hold interpharm inc 19.9 pct interest mcdowel compani sai subject contig includ futur sale profit level mcdowel four year period acquir 100 pct interpharm exchang 51 pct mcdowel vote stock sai transact expect complet within 60 dai time mcdowel board restructur includ interpharm manag
